text: NTU Hospital is a metro station on the Tamsui-Xinyi Line in Taipei, Taiwan. The station code of this station is R09. == Station layout information == The platforms are located underground. Platform 1 is for Tamsui or Beitou and Platform 2 is for Xiangshan or Daan. == Around the station == * Museum of Medical Humanities Category:Railway stations in Taipei
title: NTU Hospital metro station
